Once the servant of a deity, the graveknight champion returned as an undead after a life cut short in service to their god. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31 [Graveknight Champion](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1664) **Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 83 **Perception** +27; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +31, [Deity Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +27 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +6 **Items** _[greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ (20 arrows), _+2 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=13)_, _[greater flaming](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) [greatpick](/Weapons.aspx?ID=23)_ --- **AC** 38 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +26 **Will** +25 **HP** 275 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42), rejuvenation) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)**
**Clutching Armor** ([ <%TRAITS%11%%> arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11) <%END>, [ <%TRAITS%157%%> transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) <%END>) **Trigger** A creature attempts to move away from the graveknight; **Effect** The graveknight's armor animates and attempts to Grab the triggering creature. It makes an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35) using the graveknight's Athletics modifier â€“ 2. The armor can continue to Grapple the creature normally. Since the armor is grappling the creature, the graveknight doesn't need a free hand to do so. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** _greatpick_ +31 ([fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d10+16 slashing plus 1d6 fire **Melee** fist +30 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)), **Damage** 3d6+16 bludgeoning plus 1d6 fire **Ranged** _composite shortbow_ +28 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 3d6+10 piercing plus 1d6 fire **Innate Divine Spells** DC 33, attack +25 - **Cantrips (7th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Light](/Spells.aspx?ID=171), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **4th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119) - **5th** [Cone of Cold](/Spells.aspx?ID=47), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120) - **6th** [Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119), [Scorching Ray](/Spells.aspx?ID=992) - **7th** [Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116) **Channel Magic** The graveknight redirects magical energies through its armor, allowing it to deliver magic through an attack. The graveknight Casts a Spell that takes 1 or 2 actions to cast and requires a spell attack roll. The effects of the spell don't occur immediately but are imbued into an attack instead. The graveknight then makes a melee Strike with a weapon or [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack. The spell is coupled with the attack, using the attack roll result to determine the effects of both the Strike and the spell. This counts as two attacks for the graveknight's multiple attack penalty but doesn't apply the penalty until after it's completed Channeling Magic. The graveknight can't use Channel Magic again for 1d4 rounds. **Devastating Blast** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) The graveknight unleashes a 30-foot cone of fire. Creatures in the area take 8d12 fire damage(DC 36 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). The graveknight can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds. **Graveknight's Curse** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=38), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) This curse affects anyone who wears a graveknight's armor for at least 1 hour. **Saving Throw** DC 24 Will save; **Onset** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [doomed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 2** doomed 2, hampered 10, and cannot remove the armor (1 day); **Stage 3** dies and transforms into the armor's graveknight. **Weapon Master** The graveknight has access to the [critical specialization effects](/Rules.aspx?ID=235) of any weapons it wields.
name: Graveknight Champion
